questions.question_text: Which three security features are available in Oracle Autonomous Database Shared Infrastructure? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
As per FAQ: https://www.oracle.com/database/technologies/datawarehouse-bigdata/adb-faqs.html
Can a customer manage his or her own encryption keys?
No, in the current version there are no customer-managed keys. Oracle manages the keys.
So, correct answers should be ABE.

ABE Correct. From FAQ.. Can a customer manage his or her own encryption keys?
No, in the current version there are no customer-managed keys. Oracle manages the keys.

Selected Answer: BDE
1) Data Redaction is not correct the feature is: Data Safe

2)
Autonomous Database provides two options for Transparent Data Encryption (TDE) to encrypt your database:

 Oracle-managed encryption keys
 Customer-managed encryption keys

https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/paas/autonomous-database/adbsa/about-user-managed-key.html#GUID-F7FE0CAD-FE11-46DF-A14C-4A1E56DC5777

sorry guys, BDE, and here is the documentation https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/paas/autonomous-database/adbsa/gs-security-and-authentation-autonomous-database.html#GUID-B26111FC-311F-4A80-96F7-E3608BEC25C7

Latest feature - Customer managed encryption keys is an optional feature for Oracle Autonomous Database Shared Infrastructure. 
https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/paas/autonomous-database/adbsa/autonomous-provision.html#GUID-0B230036-0A05-4CA3-AF9D-97A255AE0C08

choices.B: You can't use Python with ADB
choices.A: The Oracle Client and the cx_Oracle interface for Python

questions.question_text:
A new Python developer has joined your team and needs to access the Autonomous Database (ADB) data.
How does the developer connect to and interact with ADB from Python? (Choose the best answer.)

choices.C: Change the Automatic Maintenance Schedule to 'No Preference'.
choices.A: Change the Automatic Maintenance Schedule to 'Specify a Schedule' but do not select any month, week or day.
choices.D: Change the Automatic Maintenance Schedule to 'None'.
choices.B: You cannot permanently disable scheduled Automatic Maintenance.

questions.question_text:
Your customer wants to permanently disable scheduled maintenance on Autonomous Dedicated Infrastructure to keep their current database version(s).
How can they achieve this? (Choose the best answer.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Answer is B from the same reference provided
C is correct answer. B have been correct if no option chooses by administrator.

yes, ans is B - from the same link in the answer "If the Autonomous Exadata Infrastructure resource doesn't have a customized schedule, its maintenance schedule will be automatically modified so that it precedes the Autonomous Container Database schedule you define."

questions.question_text: Which can be Scaled independently of the number of CPUs in an Autonomous Database? (Choose the best answer.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct.

Selected Answer: B
Fully elastic scaling:
Scale compute and storage independently to fit your database workload with no downtime

Reference: https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/paas/autonomous-database/adbsa/autonomous-key-features.html#GUID-7D0627D9-1B40-40B1-865A-84FF65A65846

B)
https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/paas/autonomous-database/adbsa/autonomous-key-features.html#GUID-7D0627D9-1B40-40B1-865A-84FF65A65846


Key Features
Fully elastic scaling: Scale compute and storage independently to fit your database workload with no downtime:

choices.A: Unplug into a pdb archive which can be uploaded to object storage.
choices.B: Create a database link from source database to the ADB environment and clone the PDB.
choices.C: Pluggable databases cannot be migrated to ADB using plug, unplug or clone.
choices.D: Unplug to an xml file so database files and xml file can be uploaded to object storage.

questions.question_text:
Your customer has upgraded their on premise 11.2 database to 12.2. During this migration the database was migrated to a pluggable database and is now in production.
How should the customer unplug their database to migrate to Autonomous Database (ADB)? (Choose the best answer.)
